title: Old Mistakes (W/ Joe DeRosa & Jezebel Sweet)
description: Ex-Corey’s Angel Jezebel Sweet tells what it was like living and touring with the Goonies star.  Joe DeRosa’s former life as a Texas State Senate reporter is revealed on cassette tape. Jay recounts the time Dave Attell and David Spade were in the audience for a performance of Ha! The Musical. Dan Soder talks about his former high school crushes that wouldn’t sleep with him.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
